HomePage.title: Zydhan Linnar Putra
HomePage.subtitle: Full-stack Web Developer
HomePage.description: Hello friends! You can call me Zydhan. I am a Bachelor of Information Engineering at Sepuluh Nopember Institute of Technology Surabaya and a web development enthusiast with 2 years of experience.

dptsi_fullstack_intern.title: Full-stack Web Developer Intern
dptsi_fullstack_intern.description: I was offered by a lecturer acting as the director of DPTSI - Directorate of Information Technology Services at Sepuluh Nopember Institute of Technology Surabaya.

dptsi_fullstack.title: Full-stack Web Developer
dptsi_fullstack.description: Modernizing back-end technology from PHP to Go and modernizing Academics Information System from PHP to Go and Next.js.
